TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlCacheDependencyDatabase extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependencyDatabase Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的 SQL 快取相依性資料庫。

span.span: Configures the SQL cache dependencies databases for an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`databases`元素`sqlCacheDependency`節點內`caching`組態區段。The allows you to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` node within the `caching` configuration section. SQL 快取相依性可讓快取的資料與原始來源同步處理。The SQL cache dependency allows the cached data to be synchronized with the original source. 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的快取和特定 SQL Server 資料庫資料表時，執行個體中儲存的項目之間的關聯性之後類別監視的可能變更的資料表。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table for possible changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料庫的連接名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection name for the database.

value.span: 字串，指定 組態區段內的資料庫連接字串的名稱。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a database connection string within the configuration section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`connectionName`屬性`add`元素`databases`組態檔中的節點。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `connectionName` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 連接名稱識別的項目`connectionStrings`> 一節，其中包含的資料庫連接字串。The connection name identifies an element in the `connectionStrings` section which contains the database connection string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`name`屬性`add`元素`databases`組態檔中的節點。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `name` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. `name`屬性會識別的資料庫的資料表用於。The `name` attribute identifies the database whose table is used for the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PollTime { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 輪詢資料庫資料表，以監視變更的頻率。

span.span: Gets or sets the frequency with which the polls the database table for changes.

value.span: 資料庫輪詢時間，以毫秒為單位。

span.span: The database polling time, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`pollTime`屬性`add`元素`databases`組態檔中的節點。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `pollTime` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的快取和特定 SQL Server 資料庫資料表時，執行個體中儲存的項目之間的關聯性之後類別監視資料表，以便在資料表變更的項目，項目時，自動在更新或移除從快取。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table so that when an item in the table changes, the item is automatically updated in or removed from the cache. 監視會發生在所指定的頻率。The monitoring happens at the frequency specified by the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#2)]
